description: Sonic Unleashed is a 2008 video game in which Sonic battles against Doctor Eggman and Dark Gaia. Most notably, in Sonic Unleashed, Sonic transforms into a "werehog" at night, granting him special abilities.
The Xbox 360 and PS3 versions of Sonic Unleashed use YNCP files to store UI elements. For example, the file ui_install.yncp contains UI elements used during the game's install process.
